item.title: Thoughts on using the pins package
item.description: body { text-align: justify} Today while reading a great post on IPO returns and in general IPO exploration on the Reproducible Finance blog, I have stumbled upon a pins package which I never heard of. I instantly loved the concepts that this package presents to its users. In the following, I am not going to write about how to install the package and about many use cases. I will focus on my thoughts on using this package and simple use cases.
